SalvageSmelter让你闻下制成的铁，金或钻石成原材料，工具和盔甲。返回的材料的数量取决于被冶炼项目的耐用性，例如铁靴在50 ％的耐久度会返回2铁锭。在49 ％的耐用性，他们将返回1，铁锭。黄金的工具可以产生掘金，而不是锭，以便在确定一个项目的价值更准确，任何项目不值得，至少1它的原料会产生一块木炭的。
（原版翻译过来的）



纯文本翻译：
[新]可选符号为主的权限。当需要-迹象：真正的config.yml炉将需要[spoiler]标志在他们身上。自动更新！
可配置的食谱
炼铁，黄金和钻石的盔甲，以及工具。陶醉，故名或损坏，无所谓。
与料斗的伟大工程！


本插件可能与锁箱子插件发生冲突！！{:10_527:}
[diamond_gem][gold_ingot][iron_ingot]注意：本插件不支持MOD如果有BUG尽快和我联系！

命令


/ salvagesmelter刷新 - 重新载入配置 
/ salvagesmelter调试 - 切换调试模式开启/关闭

权限设置





salvagesmelter.admin - 允许访问/ salvagesmelter命令。
salvagesmelter.createsign - 允许玩家创建[salvage]迹象。

既然都有人提异了那我把在渣翻译前的文章放置在下面，请自己翻译！：SalvageSmelter allows you to smelt down tools and armor made of iron, gold or diamond into raw materials. the quantity of materials returned is dependent on the durability of the item being smelted, for example iron boots at 50% durability would return 2 Iron ingots. At 49% durability they would return 1 iron ingot. Gold tools can yield nuggets instead of ingots to allow for more accuracy in determining the value of an item, and any item not worth at least 1 of it's raw materials will produce a piece of charcoal.Features
[NEW] Optional sign-based permissions. when require-signs: true in the config.yml furnaces will require [SALVAGE] signs on them.Automatic updates!Configurable RecipesSmelt iron, gold and diamond armor, as well as tools. enchanted, named or damaged, doesn't matter.works great with hoppers!Commands
/salvagesmelter reload - reload the configuration/salvagesmelter debug - toggles debug mode on/offPermissions
salvagesmelter.admin - allows access to the /salvagesmelter command.salvagesmelter.createsign - allows players to create [SALVAGE] signs.*本插件与锁箱子插件发生冲突，不知道怎么修复.....
